title: dwaathrimshath
sahitya:
dvAtrimshat jvaladAyutE ambA dvAdashAnta sthitE



anupallavi



 dvAtrimshat bhuja maNDitE ambA dvArakEsha sahajAtE suravaranutE



caraNam



 japa tapangaLa jADanari Enu tAyE vipula hOmada vidhiyanari Enu tAyE

 capala cittanadennanu salahau sapalAkSi harikEsha manamOdini
